l:dependency.name: Gradle Plugin
l:dependency.l:description: This plugin adds Gradle support to Jenkins

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Validator
l:dependency.l:description: Apache Commons Validator provides the building blocks for both client side validation and server side data validation. It may be used standalone or with a framework like Struts.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Core annotations used for value types, used by Jackson data binding package.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-core
l:dependency.l:description: Core Jackson processing abstractions (aka Streaming API), implementation for JSON

l:dependency.name: jackson-databind
l:dependency.l:description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

l:dependency.name: Commons Digester
l:dependency.l:description: The Digester package lets you configure an XML to Java object mapping module which triggers certain actions called rules whenever a particular pattern of nested XML elements is recognized.

l:dependency.name: Apache Commons Collections
l:dependency.l:description: Types that extend and augment the Java Collections Framework.
